title: I Got Scammed by Circuit City (in 2023)

WORST Tech Fails:  Steam needs to CHILL:  I Have to Come Clean:  I Got SCAMMED At Five Below...AGAIN:  iOS is Android Now:   Produced by Kinsey  Edited by Aron Goodall:   Subscribe!  Twitter:  Matt:  Instagram:   Chapter Titles ------------------------------- 0:00 He said WHAT?! 0:41 RadioShack Sucks 1:41 Mushroom nightlight 2:37 Not actually what we ordered 3:42 The mushroom makes frog noises 4:30 The Slithering Snake 5:48 FYE also sucks 6:46 4-part gaming kit 7:39 Austin breaks it immediately 8:44 Shower beer holder (yeah) 10:08 CompUSA FAILED to scam us 11:15 The Good Stuff 12:06 Washable keyboard 13:00 The JOUSE 14:22 Austins butt gets touched (for free)
